Returns: A thumbnail for the specified icon or the icon itself if the thumbnail could not be created.
Parameters: Drawable: The icon to get a thumbnail of.
createIconThumbnail(android.graphics.dra.Description: Returns a Drawable representing the thumbnail of the specified Drawable. The size of the thumbnail is defined by the dimension android.R.dimen.launcher_application_icon_size. This method is not thread-safe and should be invoked on the UI thread only.

ClassDesc: Utility class to resize icons to match default icon size.
